Ingredients.1: 1 (10 ounce) package vegan semisweet chocolate chips (such as Nestle® Toll House Simply Delicious)

Ingredients.2: 1 (11.25 ounce) can sweetened condensed coconut milk

Directions.1: Grease an 8-inch square glass baking dish with coconut oil.

Directions.2: Combine chocolate chips, sweetened condensed coconut milk, and 1/4 cup coconut oil in a saucepan. Let sit over low heat, stirring only as needed until chips are melted, 3 to 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Pour mixture into the prepared baking dish. Refrigerate until fudge is firm, 3 to 4 hours, or put in the freezer for a faster setting time.
